title: 3D Virtual Tour - 2 BR, 2 BA Condo 966 Sq. Ft. - Parking Included
posting_body: ['Mission Bay - 2 BR, 2 BA Condo 966 Sq.', 'Ft. - 3D Virtual Tour, Parking Included', 'Property Address', '300 Berry Street, Unit #1412 | San Francisco, CA 94158', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Golden Gate Properties', 'Description', '3D Virtual Tour: <URL>', 'This condo is located in the Arterra Condo complex, which is the first LEED-Certified Green Highrise Condominum.', 'This has been achieved through the creation resource-efficient systems and use of recycled and sustainable materials.', 'The 2 bedroom unit is located on the 14th floor with wonderful views of King Street and Mission Bay.', 'Within this unit is a kitchen with granite counters, Studio Becker cabinets with lighting, stainless steel appliances and an in-unit washer & dryer.', 'FEATURES:', '•2 Bedrooms', '•2 Baths', '•966 sq.', 'ft.', '•Kitchen Appliances Included', '•Washer & Dryer included', '•Storage Cage Included', '•Bike Rack in front of Parking Space', '•1 Parking Included', 'AMENITIES:', '•Concierge', '•24/7 Security at Front Desk', '•Secured building with intercom entry system', '•Park-like courtyard with benches', '•BBQ area on roof deck with views of the city', '•Fitness Facility', '•Zipcar located in building', '•Walking distance to AT&T Park, Safeway, and UCSF Medical Center at Mission Bay', '•Easy access to freeways I-280 and HWY101, downtown San Francisco, the Financial District, Mission Bay, and all modes of public transportation; SFMTA, BART & Caltrains.', '•Public Bike Space for Building residents', 'SHOWINGS:', '1.', "Schedule Appointment through 'Contact Us' on the Property Page:", '<URL>', '2.', 'Showing Guidelines Will Be Sent After a Completed Guest Card', '•Applicant(s) Must Physically View the Unit Prior to Submitting Application(s)', '•FaceTime, Skype, Zoom, or Any Other Virtual Viewing Platform/Resource Is Not Accepted as a Replacement of Physical Viewings', 'APPLICATION PROCESS:', '1.', 'Applicant(s) Must Attend Viewing Together Prior to Submitting Individual Applications', '2.', 'Applications Will Be Reviewed Once All Intended Residents Have Attended Viewing Together & Submitted An Application', '•$35 Application Fee Per Person Over 18', '•Application Fee Is Non-Refundable', '•Ownership Will Not Consider Co-Signers', '•Complete Online Application - <URL>/', '•Marketing of This Unit Will Continue Until We’ve Received Move-in Funds From an Executed Lease', 'LEASING TERMS:', '•Available Now', '•12 Month Lease', '•Security Deposit Equivalent to 1.5 X One Month of Rent', '•Building Move-In/Move-Out fee & Refundable Deposit', '•Renters Insurance Required', '•Tenant(s) pays Electricity (PG&E)', '•Gas, Water, & Trash Included', '•NO Pets', '•NO Smoking', '415 Properties, CalBRE 02055634', '©Golden Gate Properties 2022, All Rights Reserved.', 'No part of this website or any of its contents may be reproduced, copied, modified or adapted, without the prior written consent of the author, unless otherwise indicated for stand-alone materials.', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/2.0BA', 'Square Feet: 966', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $4,500.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $35.00', 'Security Deposit: $6,750.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
